skills.name: CLAW IN THE DARK
desc: • Deal random damage and true damage to all enemies that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Gain Vanish for 2 turns. Permanently increase MAX HP on self by 20%.

skills.name: DANCE OF THE JAGUAR
desc: • Deal random damage and true damage to all enemies that increases based on your MAX HP.
• Remove Block Beneficial Effects and Perfect Corruption from all allies.
• Grant Titan Shield to all allies for 2 turns.
• Block damage for allies below 50% HP and take random damage equal to 8% of your MAX HP for each hit blocked for 2 turns.

skills.name: SPIRIT GUARDIAN
desc: • At the start of the battle and at the start of your turn, grant a random Physical, Magic, or True Block on each ally for 1 turn.
• When Spirit Jaguar dies, grant Titan Shield and Vanish to all allies until they die, Increase MAX HP by 100% and heal all allies to full hp..
